metadata.title: USN-7259-1 -- GNU C Library vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU C Library incorrectly handled memory when using the assert function. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7259-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  glibc-doc - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 glibc-source - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc-bin - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc-dev-bin - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc-devtools - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-amd64 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-dev - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-dev-amd64 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-dev-i386 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-dev-x32 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-i386 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 libc6-x32 - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 locales - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 locales-all - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 nscd - 2.40-1ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
